text: (Afrikaans for "red bush"; scientific name Aspalathus linearis) is a member of the legume family of plants. Rooibos teas are herbal infusions made from a South African red bush. There are also green Rooibos teas. ==References== ==Other websites== * South African Rooibos Council * South African Medical Research Council research findings Category:Tea Category:Faboideae
title: Rooibos
